name: Résonance
description:
Let me tell you about Résonance, a "simple" puzzle/reflexion game:

- 2 Difficulty mode (Normal / One Life)
- 100 levels
- 10 seconds to prepare
- Once Box start moving, you must be ready
Seems to be easy right ?
But can you make it through all 100 levels ?
Traps, Portals, Holes, Walls, Broken Orbs, Objects moving on their own... You'll have to go through all sorts of obstacles to make sure Résonance happen in every single levels.
Let's test your observation and timing skills!

Game is saved automatically. Play it, Quit it, Play it again from where you stopped, Rage-quit it, Breathe, Try again !

12 seconds spent on each levels minimum. Never go over 30 seconds, unless your precious box met it's end.
Respawn is immediate and automatic, start the level over after death. You have an unlimited number of lives, so don't worry too much about it.

This isn't hard enough for you ? Then try the ONE LIFE MODE: go through all 100 level without dying a single time.

But... remember to have fun!
